MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY14 postcode area of Cupar. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6.17pm. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers have arrived on site at the Hill Road Newburgh substation and are investigating the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7.24pm on Wednesday 30 December 2020
